title: Sergeant Major Elon Musk Ain't Playin', Buys Twitter!
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 4 rounds in the magazine .. Round 1: Father/son drama after father accuses politician son of lying his dick off about being a nuclear submarine officer. Round 2: North Korea is actin the fool in several different ways. North Korea is the pulled hamstring of countries. Round 3: Sergeant Major Elon Musk is whipping his new recruit into shape in a way that would make Major Payne proud. Maybe in Colonel Nathan R. Jessup. Round 4: PUSHED TO MONDAY'S SHOW! Round 5: We got another plane drawing dicks. This time it was a big ole F U to Russia. We support patriotic dicks in the sky. Always have. Always will. SUPPORT THE SHOW!
